reviews.name: Lily Huynh
reviews.content: Thank you Kim! You did amazing work on my eyebrows! I feel more confident than ever before without drawing on my eyebrows everyday like I have been for over 10 years lol. I recommended this service to anyone that just wants to wake up a little more put together without the time and money it takes to do traditionally with makeup. Xoxo - Lily
